short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add UTM parameters to Pardot Emails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to add UTM parameters to Email Templates and Drafts in Pardot Lightning. Users can configure UTM Medium, Source, Campaign and Content that will be added to all link URLs in the email.

Extension offers free 7-day trial, after this period license need to be purchased for $25/year.

Documentation is available here: 
https://getwebcz.notion.site/Pardot-UTM-Parameters-Documentation-8412b094e707496e94e94ef29ca6dcdf
